title: La Iguana Perdida
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A hotel and restaurant located at the northern part of the lake with views of the volcano studded lake. Has many vegan options, including fruit salad, granola and in-house-made breads, among others. Has build your own breakfast options including pesto marinated tofu, fried potatoes, wilted spinach and grilled tomatoes, smoothies, fresh squeezed vegetable juices, build your own sandwiches, salads, dips and bruschetta. Serves a communal, family style dinner every night at 7pm. No reservations needed for breakfast and lunch, but are required for dinner by 3pm. Fresh produce is sourced and grown locally and most dishes are made-in-house, including coconut milk.
